name: Roxio Toast Document
summary: A DISC file is a project file created by Roxio Toast, a multimedia disc authoring and burning application. It contains the saved settings for a data, audio, video, or, copy, or conversion disc project. DISC files also include references to the locations of data or multimedia files included in the project and burning settings.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: DISC file open in Roxio Toast 18 Titanium
